Home
====

showing slide 1 of 1.

The world leader in accelerated computing
-----------------------------------------

NVIDIA’s invention of the GPU in 1999 sparked the growth of the PC gaming market, redefined modern computer graphics and revolutionized parallel computing. More recently, GPU deep learning ignited modern AI — the next era of computing — with the GPU acting as the brain of computers, robots and self-driving cars that can perceive and understand the world. [Learn More](https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/deep-learning-ai/)

NASDAQ: NVDA

PRICE:131.92

\-6.15Delayed  
20 minutes

[](/stock-info/stock-quote-and-chart/default.aspx)

Corporate Profile
-----------------

NVIDIA is the pioneer of GPU-accelerated computing. We specialize in products and platforms for the large, growing markets of gaming, professional visualization, data center, and automotive.

Our creations are loved by the most demanding computer users in the world – gamers, designers, and scientists. And our work is at the center of the most consequential mega-trends in technology.

[Learn More](https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/about-nvidia/ai-computing/)

![gt1080](https://investor.nvidia.com/s201.q4cdn.com/141608511/files/images/2019/geforce-2080Ti-3qtr-front-left-fullres.png)

Follow NVIDIA

 [![](https://investor.nvidia.com/s201.q4cdn.com/141608511/files/design/social/Facebook-icon.svg%20%22Facebook%22)](https://www.facebook.com/NVIDIA/)
[![](https://investor.nvidia.com/s201.q4cdn.com/141608511/files/design/social/Twitter-icon.svg%20%22Twitter%22)](https://twitter.com/nvidia)
[![](https://investor.nvidia.com/s201.q4cdn.com/141608511/files/design/social/You-Tube-icon.svg%20%22You%20Tube%22)](https://www.youtube.com/user/nvidia)
[![](https://investor.nvidia.com/s201.q4cdn.com/141608511/files/design/social/Twitch-icon.svg%20%22Twitch%20TV%22)](https://www.twitch.tv/nvidia)   

Investors and others should note that we announce material financial information to our investors using our investor relations website, press releases, SEC filings and public conference calls and webcasts. We intend to use our [@NVIDIA](https://twitter.com/NVIDIA)
 Twitter account, [NVIDIA Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/NVIDIA)
 page, [NVIDIA LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/nvidia?trk=hb_tab_compy_id_3608)
 page and company [blog](https://blogs.nvidia.com/)
 as a means of disclosing information about our company, our services and other matters and for complying with our disclosure obligations under Regulation FD. The information we post through these social media channels may be deemed material. Accordingly, investors should monitor these accounts and the blog, in addition to following our press releases, SEC filings and public conference calls and webcasts. This list may be updated from time to time.

NVIDIA
